SQLs.SQL: select p.Id,p.Name,p.CreatorId,p.CreatedAt,p.LastModifiedAt ,(select convert(nvarchar(50),pd.departmentId)+ ',' from ProjectDepartment as pd where pd.projectId = p.id for xml path('') ) as departmentIds from Project as p where p.IsDeleted = 0 and p.name like @Name and p.DepartmentId = @DepartmentId and p.CreatedAt >= @CreatedAtStart and p.CreatedAt < @CreatedAtEnd order by p.Id desc @Pager

Source.CountSQL: select count(*) from Project as p where p.IsDeleted = 0 and p.name like @Name and p.DepartmentId = @DepartmentId and p.CreatedAt >= @CreatedAtStart and p.CreatedAt < @CreatedAtEnd
